item.title: Trump picks former congressman and Fox Business host Sean Duffy for transportation secretary
item.description: The president-elect said he would nominate Duffy, who first gained notoriety on MTV's "The Real World," to succeed Transportation Secretary Pete Butti...

item.title: Super Micro hires new auditor to maintain Nasdaq listing; shares pop 37%
item.description: Super Micro said on Monday that it hired BDO as its independent auditor.

item.title: Georgia appeals court cancels arguments in Trump election case until further notice
item.description: Three other criminal cases against Donald Trump have been put in limbo on the heels of the Republican's election as president.

item.title: Canva hires former Zoom CFO Kelly Steckelberg to run finance ahead of expected IPO
item.description: Canva's new finance chief Kelly Steckelberg helped take Zoom public five years ago.

item.title: House Ethics panel to meet on Trump attorney general pick Matt Gaetz report Wednesday
item.description: Many Senate Republicans want the House Ethics Committee report on Matt Gaetz to be released. Gaetz is a close ally of President-elect Donald Trump.
